item.title: [525] Adding Coords [525]
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493

@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Graham, post:11, topic:280773”][quote author=jc22493 link=topic=370832.msg2802600#msg2802600 date=1243537240]

Yeh, he would of got that right if he used conventions and put the code in the correct place…

‘sm’ is not a convention. It’s a variable.
[/quote]

sm is a method not variable lol.

Try: getActionSender().sendMessage() instead.[/quote]
Oops, my mistake.
